title: Hailey Bieber flashes her toned stomach as she showcases fashionable fall style in New York
text:
She married Justin Bieber for the second time under two weeks ago.

But it was back to work for Hailey Bieber on Saturday when she was seen running errands solo in New York City.

The 22-year-old beauty flashed her toned stomach while stunning in a Balenciaga coat for extra warmth.

Scroll down for video

Gorgeous: Hailey Bieber flashed her incredibly lean and toned stomach on Saturday when she stepped out solo in New York City in a fashionable fall ensemble

Hailey rocked a white cropped top that featured a scooped neck and drew attention to her flat tummy.

She teamed the look with mid-wash high-waisted jeans that were rolled up at the ankle.

The new bride completed her look with a pair of white sneakers and accessorised with shades over her eyes.

Gorgeous: Hailey rocked a white cropped top that featured a scooped neck and drew attention to her flat tummy

Beauty: Hailey styled her blonde hair out into loose waves and kept her glam radiant with a bronzed complexion, blushed cheeks and a hit of pink on her lip

Hailey styled her blonde hair out into loose waves and kept her glam radiant with a bronzed complexion, blushed cheeks and a hit of pink on her lip.

The Vogue model was later spotted in the day rocking another stellar ensemble from her New York apartment on her way to a shoot.

Hailey rocked a grey sweater underneath an oversized plaid blazer for the work day.

Casual: The new bride completed her look with a pair of white sneakers and accessorised with shades over her eyes

Comfort first: She teamed the look with mid-wash high-waisted jeans that were rolled up at the ankle

She teamed the look with loose-fitting trousers of the same color and a pair of pointed-toe boots.

The niece of Alec Baldwin added designer shades and styled her hair out into natural waves.

She later took to social media in the car where she showcased her gorgeous makeup free complexion.

New photos of Hailey from her wedding to Justin Bieber emerged from the beauty's stylist on Friday.

Coffee run: Hailey attempted to keep a low profile while walking around with her morning coffee

Stylish: The Vogue model was later spotted in the day rocking another stellar ensemble from her New York apartment on her way to a shoot

Stunner: The niece of Alec Baldwin added designer shades and styled her hair out into natural waves

Hailey hit the dance floor in her shimmering pearl white Vera Wang gown, which reached down to the floor.

The outfit featured thick straps, one of which had fallen down around her arm in the commotion, and the low-cut top highlighted the catwalk star's cleavage.

'The happiest bride I ever did see. Thank you @verawang for @haileybieber custom dress she danced the night away in it. And yes duh - sneakers,' captioned Maeve Reilly.

Justin and Hailey's religious ceremony took place September 30 at the Palmetto Bluff Hotel in Bluffton, South Carolina.

Natural: She later took to social media in the car where she showcased her gorgeous makeup free complexion

Here comes the bride! New photos of Hailey from her wedding to Justin Bieber emerged from the beauty's stylist on Friday

Dancing queen: Hailey hit the dance floor in her shimmering pearl white Vera Wang gown, which reached down to the floor

Though there were plenty of celebrity guests, the actual ceremony took place in a chapel that only seated 100 guests.

Among the guests were Hailey's BFF Kendall Jenner and her younger sister Kylie and mom Kris Jenner as well as Fay Khadra and Jaden Smith.

R&B singer Usher was also present at the festivities, as was Hailey's cousin Ireland Baldwin, Leonardo DiCaprio's girlfriend Camila Morrone and Justin's manager Scooter Braun.

The dress Hailey walked down the aisle was designed by Off-White's Virgil Abloh.

She paired the lacy off–the–shoulder gown with a sheer veil over her delicately coiffed blonde tresses.

'@virgilabloh thank you for making my vision come to life and creating my dream dress,' she captioned a snap of the outfit.

'You and your @off____white team are incredible and I’m forever grateful I got to wear your beautiful creation ❤️.'
description: Hailey Bieber flashed her incredibly lean and toned stomach on Saturday when she stepped out solo in New York City in a fashionable fall ensemble.
